blogPost.excerpt: Quicksize gives you your exact size in the brand and model of your choice based on what you already have in your closet. Coming on Apple and Android soon!
blogPost.body: Quicksize gives you your exact size in the brand and model of your choice based on what you already have in your closet. Coming on Apple and Android soon!
blogPost.title: Quicksize - Never order the wrong size again
blogPost.author: Samuel Loy

localize.description: Quicksize根据您衣柜里已有的衣服，为您提供您所选择的品牌和型号的准确尺寸。即将在苹果和安卓上推出
Quicksize根據您衣櫃裏已有的衣服，爲您提供您所選擇的品牌和型號的準確尺寸。即將在蘋果和安卓上推出

previous.excerpt: A set of 4 ready-to-go, carefully designed email templates which can be easily customized for great flexibility.
previous.title: Stencil - Customizable email templates

localize.description: 一套4个现成的，精心设计的电子邮件模板，可以很容易地定制，具有很大的灵活性。
localize.tagline: 可定制的电子邮件模板

localize.description: 一套4個現成的，精心設計的電子郵件模板，可以很容易地定製，具有很大的靈活性。
localize.tagline: 可定製的電子郵件模板

next.excerpt: Based on Codeforces, Game of Codes is all about competitive programming, be it practicing, analyzing, learning, or even doing contests with your friends! This is full in one package for Codeforces lovers, and have 2000+ users registered and growing.
next.title: Game Of Codes - Level up your code

localize.description: 基于Codeforces，Game of Codes是一款关于竞技编程的游戏，无论是练习、分析、学习，甚至是和你的朋友一起做比赛都是如此! 这是为Codeforces爱好者提供的全套服务，目前已有2000+用户注册，并在不断增长。
基於Codeforces，Game of Codes是一款關於競技編程的遊戲，無論是練習、分析、學習，甚至是和你的朋友一起做比賽都是如此! 這是爲Codeforces愛好者提供的全套服務，目前已有2000+用戶註冊，並在不斷增長。
